description: Southampton 1-1 Crystal Palace: Did you know?
title: Southampton 1-1 Crystal Palace: Did you know?
title_page: Southampton 1-1 Crystal Palace: Did you know? - BBC Sport
maintext: Crystal Palace are unbeaten in their past 10 away league games (W6 D4). In fact, since the start of this run in November, no side has picked up more points on the road than the Eagles in the Premier League (22, alongside Liverpool).
